memberdef.argsstring: (dtsgui_configcb confcallback_cb, void *userdata, struct point wsize, struct point wpos, const char *title, const char *status)
memberdef.name: dtsgui_config

briefdescription.para: Configure the GUI and create a application frame.

detaileddescription.para: This is the first process required the application is created and the callback is executed.
Application processing continues until dtsgui_run is executed at this point the call back is executed and proccessing will be passed to the GUI App.
The userdata is returned in the callback.
The Callback must return a non zero value to indicat success should the application fail returning 0 will close the application.

parameterdescription.para: The callback function where processing will continue.
a refrenced object passed back to the config callback.
Minimum/Initial size of the application window.
Application position [Top Left Corner] of application placed on screen.
Title displayed on the application bar.
Default text displayed on the status bar.

briefdescription.para: Configure the GUI and create a application frame.

detaileddescription.para: Pass application processing to the GUI after calling the configure callback.

parameterdescription.para: Number of paramaters contained in argv.
Array of paramaters to be passed.

briefdescription.para: Obtain a reference for the application userdata.

simplesect.para: This reference must be un refferenced.

parameterdescription.para: Application data ptr.

briefdescription.para: Append text to the title enclosed in square brackets Update the main application title bar text.

parameterdescription.para: Application Data ptr.
Text to append

briefdescription.para: Emit a event handled by event callback's A event is emited and recived by all active handlers The ID can be determined as required.

parameterdescription.para: Application data ptr
Event ID to send

briefdescription.para: Set the displayed panel.

detaileddescription.para: Switch the curent pane with the one provided this should not be done and rather use menu callbacks.

parameterdescription.para: Application data ptr
Panel to display

briefdescription.para: Callback to run to create and activate the toolbar. The toolbar has of yet not been wrapped into the C API Its recomended that a C++ object be linked that contains a derived class of wxToolbar.

parameterdescription.para: Application data ptr.
Toolbar create callback.
Userdata to be passed to the toolbar

briefdescription.para: Disable or enable the toolbar.

parameterdescription.para: Application data ptr.
Display the toolbar if non zero.

parameterdescription.para: Panel to update title.
New status bar message.

briefdescription.para: Create a new menu and append it to the menu bar.

detaileddescription.para: A new menu is created and appended to the menu bar the returned value will be passed to menu functions to append items to.

parameterdescription.para: Application data ptr
Name of the menu.

detaileddescription.para: The specified call back will be called passing the application pointer (dtsgui), the name and data ptr supplied. if this function returns a DTSObject pane it will be displayed.

parameterdescription.para: Menu where to put append this item.
Application data created on application startup and returned in most callbacks.
Menu hint with a & indicating the highlighted short key.
displayed on status bar and returned in callback.
if not zero will blank the display before executing callback.

A ptr to a referenced object.

detaileddescription.para: this pane needs to be created and not deleted use of this function is discouraged. the callback menu function is recomended where a panel can be dynamically created and returned.

parameterdescription.para: Menu where to put append this item.
Application data created on application startup and returned in most callbacks.
Menu hint with a & indicating the highlighted short key.
Panel must be a derived window of DTSObject.

briefdescription.para: Helper function to handle "Adding" a new tab from a existing tab.

detaileddescription.para: This implements the concept of the New button a new panel will be created from the data filled in on the pane this callback is attached too. A new XML node is created and the panel created from this node.

simplesect.para: this callback helper is rather complex.

parameterdescription.para: Table view the new panel will be added too.
The panel this callback is attached too.
the path of the new node.
the name of the XML node to create in the xpath.
the item in the panel to be used to create the value of the new node.
the attribute to be used too create the title in the new pane.
Callback to allow setting the data used in pane creation.
Callback to configure the pane.
Referrenced object containing initial callback data.
XML doc reference for creating the node / panel.
Referenced object made available in callbacks.

simplesect.para: Nothing is returned the callback is registered on the panel.

parameterdescription.para: A form item containing a listbox or combobox.
The text appearing on the drop down box.
The value set when this item is selected.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct form_item *lb, struct xml_doc *xmldoc, const char *xpath, const char *nattr, const char *vattr)
memberdef.name: dtsgui_listbox_addxml

briefdescription.para: Populate a listbox or combobox from a XML path. A entry is added for each node found using the supplied attributes for displayed text and value.

simplesect.para: passing NULL as either or both of the attributes will use the value of the node.

parameterdescription.para: A form item containing a listbox or combobox.
XML Document to search.
XML search path.
Attribute whoose value will be used for name on list.
Attribute whoose value will be used for value.

briefdescription.para: Set the selected item on a list box or combobox to the index.

parameterdescription.para: A form item containing a listbox or combobox.
the index to set as the selected value.

briefdescription.para: Request Yes/No Confirmation from the user.

parameterdescription.para: Application data ptr.
Text to supply in the alert.

simplesect.para: Non zero if the user affirmed.

briefdescription.para: Alert the user and expect a confirmation.

parameterdescription.para: Application data ptr.
Text to supply in the alert.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct dtsgui *dtsgui, const char *text, int maxval, int quit)
memberdef.name: dtsgui_progress_start

briefdescription.para: Initialise the progress dialog Pop up a dialog box that can be updated to showprogress with a optional cancel button.

parameterdescription.para: Application data ptr.
Text displayed in the popup box.
the maximum expected value to update.
Disable the cancel button if quit is zero.

briefdescription.para: Update the progress bar counter This function updates the current progress value and optionally allows setting new displayed text.

parameterdescription.para: Application data ptr.
Update the counter with this value.
Text displayed in the popup box.

simplesect.para: 0 on success may fail when the user presses cancel.

briefdescription.para: Increments the counter by adding to it not setting it.

parameterdescription.para: Application data ptr.
Value to increment progress bar.
Text displayed in the popup box.

simplesect.para: 0 on success may fail when the user presses cancel.

briefdescription.para: Disable the progress bar.

parameterdescription.para: Application data ptr.

briefdescription.para: Return reference to hashed bucket list of items.

detaileddescription.para: The bucket list API in dtsapplib contains more information.

parameterdescription.para: Panel to obtain list from.

briefdescription.para: Get refernece to data stoed on element.

detaileddescription.para:
Each element is capable of storing user supplied data this returns a reference to this data.
dtsgui_item::GetData()
fi
Form item to obtain data from.
Reference to data stored in item.

briefdescription.para: Return name of element.

simplesect.para: the name must not be freed and the form itme must not be un referenced

parameterdescription.para: Form item.

briefdescription.para: Return value of element. The value of the panel element is returned fo the item.

simplesect.para: The return value must be freed.

parameterdescription.para: Form item to obtain value of.

briefdescription.para: Return refernece to a form element. Find a item and return it searcing the bucket list for the specified name.

parameterdescription.para: panel who's item list is to be searched.
Return item with this name.

simplesect.para: Form item if found matching the name.

briefdescription.para: Helper function to return a value of a item. This function finds a value by name returning the value.

simplesect.para: the returned value must be freeed.

parameterdescription.para: Panel to search element.
Return value of element with this name.

briefdescription.para: Create a new wizard.

detaileddescription.para: A wizard consists of multiple panels linked with back/next controls each panel will need to be procesed on completion.

parameterdescription.para: Aplication data ptr.
Title shown on title bar of wizard pop up.

simplesect.para: New wizard that needs pages added too and run.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct dtsgui_wizard *dtswiz, const char *title, void *userdata, struct xml_doc *xmldoc)
memberdef.name: dtsgui_wizard_addpage

briefdescription.para: Create a panel appended to the wizard.

parameterdescription.para: Wizard to add page too.
Title of the new panel.
Userdata to be referenced and stored on the panel.
Optional XML Doc to be referenced and stored on the panel.

simplesect.para: New panel that will need to be configured and processed after completion.

briefdescription.para: Run the wizard.

detaileddescription.para: Pop up the wizard window and open first page on success its required that the panels information be processed. When the wizard is un refferenced the panels are deleted.

parameterdescription.para: Wizard too run.

parameterdescription.para: Menu to enable/disable.
Enable all items if set to non zero.

briefdescription.para: Prepare a HTTP POST structure from panel.

detaileddescription.para: Create a HTTP Post structure from the values and names Of elements on a panel this can then be used with curl_post to post to a URL.

parameterdescription.para: Panel to create from.

briefdescription.para: Return basic auth reference from a password dialog box. A dialog box requesting the user name and password is presented to the user. The initial values may be supplied.

simplesect.para: This function is used as a callback for CURL.

parameterdescription.para: initial username entered into the box.
the initial password.
this will always be the application data ptr.

briefdescription.para: Main include file for the GUI Library.

detaileddescription.para: This file needs to be included to use the defined functions and API. Including it in a C++ file without defining _DTS_C_API will not allow access to the namespace DTS_C_API.
It is not recomended to use the C API from C++.
